Title: Edward 'Eddie the Eagle' Edwards
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Dan Levy, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Barry gets inspired by Olympic underdog Eddie "the Eagle" Edwards, while Beverly decides that the latest furniture craze is the answer to slumping sales at Murray's store.
